root.name: Echoes of Eternea
root.description: OverviewEchoes of Eternea is an upcoming RPG for the PC being developed by a small independent team led by Ryan Harmon. It is meant to be a modern take on classically designed Japanese RPGs of the early 1990s. The team is currently receiving pledges to help the project's development through Kickstarter.com and exceeded their target goal of $10,000 in the first few days after it was posted.Originally developed in RPG Maker VX, development has since been transferred to a new, custom engine being developed by Divergent Games. The game was originally entitled "Echoes of Eternia", however, after receiving a legal letter from Mattel telling them they could not use the word "Eternia" (the setting of the Masters of the Universe franchise), they were forced to change the title.
